name: biomni-query-gwas-catalog
title: Biomni: Query Gwas Catalog
description: Query the NHGRI-EBI GWAS Catalog for genome-wide association study findings linking genetic variants to traits and diseases.
content:
Overview

Searches the GWAS Catalog, a curated collection of published genome-wide association studies containing SNP-trait associations with P-values < 1×10⁻⁵. Provides comprehensive data on genetic loci associated with complex human traits, diseases, and quantitative phenotypes across thousands of studies.

Input Parameters

  • prompt (string, optional): Natural language query about GWAS findings
  • endpoint (string, optional): Specific GWAS Catalog API endpoint
  • max_results (integer, optional): Maximum number of results to return (default: 3)

Input Format

Create a JSON file with the following structure:

{
  "prompt": "Find GWAS hits for type 2 diabetes",
  "endpoint": "/studies",
  "max_results": 10
}

Biological Use Case

Critical for understanding genetic architecture of complex diseases, identifying candidate causal genes, prioritizing variants for functional studies, and discovering new biological pathways. Researchers use GWAS Catalog to find disease-associated loci, perform enrichment analyses, interpret personal genomics data, and inform precision medicine strategies.

Output

Returns a JSON file (gwas_catalog_results.json) containing association data including SNP rsIDs, genomic coordinates, risk alleles, P-values, odds ratios, mapped genes, trait descriptions, study metadata, sample sizes, and ancestry information for significant genetic associations.

Category
